option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
name: Build and Push Docker image
on: push: branches: [ "main" ]
jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Set up JDK 21 uses: actions/setup-java@v4 with: distribution: 'temurin' java-version: '21'
- name: Build with Maven run: mvn package -DskipTests
- name: Log in to Docker Hub uses: docker/login-action@v3 with: username: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }} password: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN }}
- name: Build Docker image run: | docker build -t ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}/enumdaytask:latest .
- name: Push Docker image run: | docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}/enumdaytask:latest
